name: lacona-addon-stateful
description: Add statefulness to the Lacona parser

scripts.lint: npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:test
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.cover: istanbul cover _mocha test -- -R dot && istanbul report text
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha test --report lcovonly -- -R dot && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rimraf ./coverage

author: @brandonhorst
